articles.author: George Foster
articles.title: Tech expert calls the Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller "a cash grab" due to some potentially fatal flaws - TheGamer
articles.description: "This is a p**s-poor excuse for a controller."
articles.content:
YouTuber and tech expert iFixit has given a rather damning review of the Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller, calling it "piss poor" due to how difficult it is to repair and its high cost.

articles.title: Children fetching water killed in Israeli strike in Gaza, emergency officials say - BBC
articles.description: The Israeli military said there had been a "technical error" with a strike targeting a "terrorist" and it was under review.
articles.content:
Rushdi Abualouf
Ten people, including six children, have been killed in an Israeli air strike while waiting to fill water containers in central Gaza on Sunday, emergency service officials say.
